trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to a parameter object.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定的属性的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>到参数对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ControlParameter class to bind the value of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> property, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>, to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ControlParameter 类绑定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>，到参数化的 SQL 查询、 业务对象方法或筛选表达式中使用的参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The ControlParameter class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ControlParameter 类提供除继承自两个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类︰<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property identifies which <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance to bind to and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property identifies the public property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> from which the ControlParameter class retrieves a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>属性标识哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>要绑定到实例和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性标识的公共属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>ControlParameter 类从中检索一个值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化未命名的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>初始化使用 ControlParameter 构造函数创建的对象时，所有其属性的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties are initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性初始化为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class with values from the specified instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>类中的指定实例的值。

trans-unit.source: The ControlParameter constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> instance.
trans-unit.target: ControlParameter 构造函数是用于克隆的受保护的复制构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> properties, are all transferred to the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性，是否传输到新实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> instance from which the current instance is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref>从当前实例已初始化实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的命名实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>类，使用指定的控件名称以标识要绑定到哪一个控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, which identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>使用 ControlParameter 构造函数创建的对象初始化使用指定的参数名称和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>标识的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>参数绑定到。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Other properties, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>，使用默认值初始化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified property name and control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的命名实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>类，使用指定的属性名称和控件名称以标识要绑定到哪一个控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property, which identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>使用 ControlParameter 构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定的参数名称，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>名称，并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性，它标识<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>参数绑定到。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Other properties, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>, are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>，使用默认值初始化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件上的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class by using the specified parameter name, database type, control ID, and property name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>通过使用指定的参数名称、 数据库类型、 控件 ID 和属性名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named and strongly typed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified property name and control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新的命名和强类型实例的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>类，使用指定的属性名称和控件名称以标识要绑定到哪一个控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>使用 ControlParameter 构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定的参数名称， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>名称，并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> properties are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>使用默认值初始化属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The type that the parameter represents.
trans-unit.target: 该参数表示的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 参数绑定到控件的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的重复<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The Clone method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A> copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> class with the values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 克隆方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A>复制构造函数以初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>类的当前实例的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> that is an exact duplicate of the current one.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref>是当前的精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件的名称， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref>对象绑定到。

trans-unit.source: The ControlID property is a required property that identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object binds to at run time.
trans-unit.target: ControlID 属性是必需的属性标识<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象绑定，以在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ControlID and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties are set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method to correctly bind to a control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，ControlID 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法以正确绑定到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the ControlID property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception when called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置 ControlID 属性中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.ArgumentException>异常时调用。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，它表示 Web 服务器控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Updates and returns the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 更新，并返回的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object attempts to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object and property every time the Evaluate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象尝试将绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>对象和每次调用时评估方法的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The Evaluate method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 评估方法返回通过的组合标识的控件的属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> class never uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property, which is inherited from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>, when binding to a control's property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>类永远不会使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>，当绑定到控件的属性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 方法，此实现中`context`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`control`参数是`null`，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the request.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>的请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>参数绑定到。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示参数的更新和当前值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property name of the control identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*> property that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由该控件的属性名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*>属性， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref>对象绑定到。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyName property identifies the public property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object binds to at run time.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName 属性标识的公共属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>对象由标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象绑定，以在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: PropertyName can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A> syntax to identify complex control properties.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName 可以设置为一个简单的字符串，如"SelectedValue"，或表达式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A>语法来标识复杂控件属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A>

trans-unit.source: While the PropertyName property is optional, typically both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and PropertyName properties are set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method to correctly bind to a control.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName 属性是可选的而通常同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>并且 PropertyName 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法以正确绑定到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property but not the PropertyName property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method attempts to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> attribute to identify a default PropertyName property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>属性，但不是 PropertyName 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法试图使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>属性用于标识默认 PropertyName 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: (It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: （它位于控件作者，此属性指定的责任。）如果此操作失败，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>异常。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表标识了哪些 ASP.NET 控件修饰属性与<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of a control's property that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，它表示控件的属性名称的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref>将绑定到。
